RT Georgios Konstantopoulos: As Foundry is stabilizing and we've been putting more and more time on Reth, I admit we've neglected building tutorials f...
entry.summary: RT Georgios Konstantopoulos As Foundry is stabilizing and we've been putting more and more time on Reth, I admit we've neglected building tutorials for beginners. While Foundry may be the obvious choice for new projects for experts, it's still not for all newbies. What Foundry tutorials should we make?

entry.title: 🚨 P21: Simplifying Governance In summary, this proposal: - Speeds up Governance (15 > 10 days) - Reduces threshold for members to elevate proposals...
entry.summary: 🚨 P21: Simplifying Governance In summary, this proposal: - Speeds up Governance (15 > 10 days) - Reduces threshold for members to elevate proposals to Snapshot (50k > 25k $CODE) Please exercise your Gov rights and cast your votes, we need ~50 more 🙏 https://buff.ly/3W4gBU8
